KeyCondition.Description: Subject's key condition (either x and y for male and female or vice versa)

Accuracy_Bn.Description: Subject's accuracy for trial in block n

RT_Bn.Description: Subject's response time for trial in block n

Bubbles.Description: Location of the bubble centers for each trial
Bubbles.Note: The 128x128 image is vectorized.Therefore, the given location is an element of a 1x16384 image vector
